note_content: Patient presenting for intake evaluation following referral from PCP for depression symptoms. Reports depressed mood for past 2 months following job loss. PHQ-9 score of 14 indicating moderate depression. When completing Columbia Suicide Severity Rating Scale, patient answered NO to all screening questions including: wish to be dead, suicidal thoughts, suicidal thoughts with method, suicidal intent, and suicidal intent with plan. No history of self-harm or suicide attempts. No homicidal ideation. Start psychotherapy, consider medication if no improvement in 4 weeks.
test_type: Structured assessment with explicit negative responses - must extract as none
